threads.title: 820-01987 PP3V3_G3S_EN 1.8V
threads.message:
Board shows apple logo and shutdown 
PPBUS_G3H =12.60V
PP5V_G3S =5.1V
PP3V3_G3S=0.422V
PP3V3_G3S_EN=1.8V ...
Help 🙏 ....

threads.title: 820-01987 PP3V3_G3S_EN 1.8V
threads.message:
Just tried DFU 
System displays while installing system and give error 9 And shutdown

threads.title: 820-01987 PP3V3_G3S_EN 1.8V
threads.message: Connect known good battery and try again.

threads.message: No difference tried in another complete casing

threads.title: 820-01987 PP3V3_G3S_EN 1.8V
threads.message:

threads.title: 820-01987 PP3V3_G3S_EN 1.8V
threads.message: It won't get to target disk mode before it turns off
